knimeNode.name: RDKit Fingerprint
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generates fingerprints for an input RDKit Mol column.

fullDescription.intro: Generates fingerprints for an input RDKit Mol column and appends them to the table. Several fingerprint types are available. Not all settings are used for each type. Settings that are not supported by a fingerprint type will be disabled/hidden and will have no effect. The settings a fingerprint gets generated with are made available as column properties and can be visualized with the RDKit Interactive View Node.
fullDescription.option:
The type of fingerprint to generate. Choices are:
Morgan: Circular fingerprint based on the Morgan algorithm and connectivity invariants (ECFP-like)
FeatMorgan: Circular fingerprint based on the Morgan algorithm and feature invariants (FCFP-like)
AtomPair: Atom-pair fingerprint
Torsion: Topological-torsion fingerprint
RDKit: Daylight-like topological fingerprint
Avalon: Fingerprint from the Avalon toolkit (http://sourceforge.net/p/avalontoolkit/)
Layered: An experimental substructure-matching fingerprint
MACCS: RDKit implementation of the 166 public MACCS keys
Name of the fingerprint column in the output table.
Toggles removal of the input RDKit Mol column in the output table.
Number of bits in the fingerprint.
Path length to be used (Torsion only).
The radius of the atomic environments considered.
Which atomic layers should be included.

option.name: Advanced - Fingerprint Settings - Min Path Length

fullDescription.option: Minimum length (in bonds) of the paths to be considered.

option.name: Advanced - Fingerprint Settings - Max Path Length

fullDescription.option: Maximum length (in bonds) of the paths to be considered.

option.name: Advanced - Rooted Fingerprints - Create rooted fingerprint

fullDescription.option: Check this option to create a rooted fingerprint based on an atom list. This option is not applicable to all fingerprint types.

option.name: Advanced - Rooted Fingerprints - Atom list column for rooted fingerprints

fullDescription.option: The column containing the atom lists that are necessary when calculating rooted fingerprints.
Check this option to include the atoms when calculating rooted fingerprints or uncheck to exclude them.
